content.rendered:
S.No. Name of the Exam Issue of Form Last Date of Submission Examination Date Information Webpage Application Form Fee
1 JEE(Main)- 2022 01-03-2022 05-04-2022 Phase I- 21st April to 4th May, 2022 Phase II- 24th May to 29th May 2022 jeemain.nta.nic.in 1. RS. 650 FOR MALE CANDIDATES OF UNRESERVED/OBC CATEGORY,
2. RS. 325 FOR FEMALE CANDIDATES OF UNRESERVED/OBC CATEGORY,
3. RS. 325 FOR SC/ST/PWD/TRANSGENDER CATEGORY CANDIDATES
2 VELLORE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (VITEEE) December 02, 2021 To be announced To be announced VITEEE.VIT.AC.IN 1. Application Form Fee is Rs.1250/
3 [NEET (UG) –2021]-NATIONAL ELIGIBILITY CUM ENTRANCE TEST To be announced neet.nta.nic.in 1. Rs 1500 for General., 2. Rs 1400 for General-EWS/ OBC-NCL* 3. Rs 800 for SC/ST/PwBD/Third Gender
4 Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana(KVPY-2021) to be announced www.kvpy.iisc.ernet.in 1. General & OBC- Rs.1250 2. ST/SC/PH/PWD- Rs.650
5 SRM (SRMJEEE) November 16, 2021 Phase I-January 2, 2022 Phase II- April 18, 2022 Phase III-June 20, 2022 Phase I- January 8 & 9, 2022 Phase II- April 23 & 24, 2022 Phase III- June 25 & 26, 2022 SRMUNIV.AC.IN 1. Application Form Fee is Rs.1100/
6 MANIPAL UNIVERSITY (MET) Phase I-December 11, 2020 Phase II-April 11, 2021 Phase I-April 10, 2021 Phase II-June 5, 2021 Phase I-16th to 20th April Phase II- 11th to 14th June 2021 MANIPAL.EDU 1. GENERAL CATEGORY CANDIDATES APPLICATION FEE RS. 600 + TEST FEE OF RS. 1400 TOTAL FEE = RS. 2000/- ,
2. FOREIGN/ INTERNATIONAL/ NRI SPONSORED APPLICATION – RS. 2500/-
7 BIRLA INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY AND SCIENCE (BITSAT) Session I-14th March 2022 Session I-21stMay 2022 (Saturday) Session I-20thJune (Monday) to 26thJune (Sunday), 2022 BITSADMISSION.COM 1. . A candidate who originally opts to appear once (Session 1), will pay a fee of Rs. 3400 (for a male candidate) and Rs. 2900 (for a female candidate).
2. If such a candidate chooses then to apply to appear a second time (Session 2), then he/she will have to pay an additional sum of Rs. 2000 (for a male candidate) and Rs. 1500 (for a female candidate). These fees are non-refundable and non-transferable
8 UPESEAT NOVEMBER 19, 2020 Phase 1- June 12, 2021 Phase 2- July 14, 2021 Phase 1- June 17 to 19, 2021 Phase 2- July 17 to 19, 2021 upes.ac.in 1. FOR FOREIGN NATIONALS US$ 75
2. ALL CATEGORY CANDIDATES RS. 1350
9 JEE(ADVANCED) INDIAN INSTITUTES OF TECHNOLOGY June 08,2022 June 15,2022 July 03,2022 JEEADV.AC.IN
10 CONSORTIUM OF MEDICAL, ENGINEERING AND DENTAL COLLEGES OF KARNATAKA (COMEDK) 2ND WEEK OF MAY 2021 (TENTATIVE) COMEDK.ORG 1. PCM (COMEDK ONLY) – 1600 + TAXES
2. PCM (COMEDK AND UNI-GAUGE BOTH) – 2600 + TAXES
11 KALINGA INSTITUTE OF INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGY (KIIT) DECEMBER 10, 2020 MAY 31, 2021 16-06-2021 TO 23-06-2021 KIIT.AC.IN NO APPLICATION/EXAMINATION FEES FOR KIITEE
12 KLEEE EXAM November, 2021 Phase II- , January 24, 2021 Phase II-January 27, 28 and 29, 2021 KLUNIVERSITY.IN STUDENT HAVE TO PAY AN ONLINE KLEEE 2021 APPLICATION FEE OF RS 1000 IN ORDER TO APPEAR IN THE EXAM.
13 Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies (NMIMS-CET) 16-02-2021 17-06-2021 27 June, 2 July & 4 July 2021 engineering.nmims.edu/academics/admissions 1. Rs.1800 for the 1st Attempt
2. Rs.3600 for the 2nd Attempt
14 Indian Institute of Science, Banglore (IISc) 22.02.2021 30.04.2021 ug.iisc.ac.in The application fee is Rs. 500/-for GN/EWS/OBC/KM candidates and Rs. 250/-for SC/ST/PwDcategories
15 Chennai Mathematical Institute (CMI) 01-05-2021 31-05-2021 27-06-2021 www.cmi.ac.in/admissions 1. B.Sc Courses Rs.750/-
16 National Entrance Screening Test (NEST) 24th February 2021 30th April 2021 14th June 2021 www.nestexam.in 1. The application fee for the male candidates of General and OBC categories is Rs. 1,200/–.
2. The application fee for candidates in the SC/ST/PwD categories and for all female candidates is Rs.600/–.
17 West Bengal Joint Entrance Exam (WBJEE) 23rd December 2021 10th January 2022 23rd April 2022 wbjeeb.nic.in 1. For general category candidates Rs. 500/-
2. For SC/ ST/OBC categories candidates Rs. 400/-
18 National Aptitude Test in Architecture (NATA) To be announced www.nata.in
19 Indian Statistical Institute (ISI-Kolkata) To be announced www.isical.ac.in 1. For general category candidates Rs. 1250
2. For SC/ ST/ OBC- NCL/ PWD category candidates Rs. 625
20 Indian Institutes of Science Education and Research (IISER)
